mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.ROOM_TYPE AS roomType /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE /* 채널고객사 숙소 유형 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8), EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE_PK(P),SYS_C0011304(C) */ AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE_PK(P),SYS_C0011305(C) */ AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE_PK(P),SYS_C0011306(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE /* 채널고객사 숙소 유형 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.ROOM_TYPE AS roomType /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE /* 채널고객사 숙소 유형 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE.ROOM_TYPE DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE SET /* 채널고객사 숙소 유형 */ WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_ROOM_TYPE /* 채널고객사 숙소 유형 */ WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
